content: {"name": "Department of Probation, Brooklyn", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Neon Nutrition Kitchen food pantry is  located at 345 adams street 6th floor", "email": "", "url": "https://www.nyc.gov/site/neon/programs/nutrition-kitchen.page", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "345 Adams St", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11201", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.6926226, "longitude": -73.9884258}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 488-3640", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}]}
